messages.content: Write a poem about the beauty of nature.

The beauty of nature can't be explained in words,
It's best seen and not heard.
It's best felt with all your heart,
You have to experience it to understand.
There's majestic mountains,
Beautiful meadows,
Lush forests,
and amazing deserts,
All in one earthly creation.
It's how the Lord made us all,
He loves us all,
and has each us Gifted with senses to see,
The beauty of nature.
how well doe sit rhyme? give it a score between 0 and 100
